foi.desc: frequencies of interest specified as [1xN1] for individual FOIs

toi.desc: the times on which the analysis windows should be centered, specified as [1xN2] in milliseconds

twoicps.desc: width of the analysis window-of-interest specified in cycle-per-sample (i.e. decreasing with frequencies of interest)

spectralsmoothing.desc: the amount of spectral smoothing specifed as a ratio relative to frequencies of interest (i.e. increasing with frequencies of interest)

weightedaveraging.desc: weight data with trial number when averaging

baselinewindow.desc: specify baseline as [begin end] in milliseconds for baseline correction, specify "all" for the complete trial

ignorebefore.desc: ignore trials before this one, negative number means for each trialtype

ignoreafter.desc: ignore trials after this one, negative number means for each trialtype

bandspecification.desc: averaging frequency estimate according to the bands, adjusted if stream ipf is also provided

bandbound.desc: band boundaries [1xN] cell of [1x2] double arrays in Hz

snapshotfwoi.desc: timefrequencywindow-of-interest for snapshots specified as [start stop] in Hz (as Nx2 matrix) or in bands corresponding to bandspecification.band

snapshottwoi.desc: timefrequencywindow-of-interest for snapshots specified as [start stop] in milliseconds (as Nx2 matrix)
